
def isPoli(n):
	sn = str(n)
	left = sn[:len(sn)/2]
	right = sn[len(sn)%2+len(sn)/2:]
	return left == right[::-1]
	
def solve(n):
	ans = 0
	while not isPoli(n):
		n += int(str(n)[::-1])
		ans += 1
	return str(ans) + " " + str(n)

for i in xrange(int(raw_input())):
	n = int(raw_input())
	print solve(n)
